deposit_cap.description: Maximum number of tokens that can be deposited into the vault.

fee_config.description: Optional fee configuration. If None, fees are disabled by default.

subvaults.description: Initial sub-vault smart contracts to be managed by the Control Center.

whitelist.description: Addresses that are allowed to execute permissioned actions on the smart contract.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

FeeConfigInit.description: Configuration for performance fee tracking, used during instantiation or migration.

fee_rate.description: Fee rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.2 for 20%)

fee_recipient.description: Address where fee shares are minted to
